Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

I'm working on making several map of Kerbin with names for the continents, major bodies of water (e.g., big lakes, oceans, rivers), and countries, and I would love some feedback as I complete each map.

The original map is by Pds314, and can be found here.

All of the names are generated by donjon.

Here's the imgur album, as I make more maps I'll add them:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I would greatly appreciate feedback on the maps!

The Romir Alliance is an alliance between the extremely advanced nation Samarna, and the nation Hytirai, which has recently undergone the Industrial Revolution.

This alliance is focused primarily around kethane, as Samarna has promised technological advancements, in return for exclusive access to the large Kethane reserves beneath Hytirai.

The Stygate Compact is an alliance between the technologically advanced nation Euegannar and the Zuumalan Confederation of States (ZCS), a loose collection of resource-rich islands in the Zuumalan Sea, which have technologies associated with the Age of Steam.

Euegannar gets the resources it needs to fund its aerospace program from the ZCS, while the ZCS are promised protection by the technologically advanced Euegannar.

The Alliance of Oceanic States is a confederation of island nations, which are on the cusp of space exploration. The primary factor preventing them from exploring space is funding, since none of the member nations has a steady flow of income. Thus, they pooled their resources to construct a basic runway on the largest island of Elonos, the most equatorial of the nations, such that the alliance may be able to construct spaceplanes to efficiently explore near-Kerbin space.

Edited August 1, 2014 by 5donuts
info on factions/nations
